name: 77th: The Game
description:
The 77th: The Game is a first-person singleplayer puzzle game. To climb the ranks of the community and advance through the semi-linear narrative, you must solve the various diagetic puzzles. Use your creativity and attentiveness to get through the story and unveil all the game has to offer.

Achievements

Unlock achievements by solving puzzles in specific ways and managing to perform certain actions. This awards you who have both skill and creativity. Can you unlock them all?

Multiple Endings

Reach the different endings by completing the game in various ways. Try out different actions in every playthrough, and be creative to reach ends, to see all the outcomes that could be.

Underlying Lore

Uncover the deep underlying lore. Pay attention to every detail to explore and understand the vast background of the community.
